snippet: James Ward won 10 of the last 11 games to earn a stunning five-set victory against Sam Querrey in San Diego and give Britain a 2-0 lead over the United States in the first round of the Davis Cup.
abstract: James Ward beats Sam Querrey to give Britain 2-0 lead over United States in first round of Davis Cup; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: James Ward won 10 of the last 11 games to earn a stunning five-set victory against Sam Querrey in San Diego and give Britain a 2-0 lead over the United States in the first round of the Davis Cup.
